description:
In this First Volume of 12 Volumes Lightwave Instructor Adam Gibson introduces the 3D student to Lightwave's Powerful Modeler. A great series for beginner 3D students.

Table of Contents for Modeler Volume #1

Chapter 1- Intro

Chapter 2- Modeler Overview

Chapter 3- Polygon Types and Theory

Chapter 4- Unit Primitives

Chapter 5- The Move Tool in Detail

Chapter 6- Axis Translate Tool (Part One)

Chapter 7- Axis Translate Tool (Part Two)

Chapter 8- Axis Translate Tool (Part Three)

Chapter 9- Final

Running Time: 3 hrs. 19 mins.

Resolution: 1920 x 1080 pixels

Video Format: MP4 Video (.mp4)

Level: Beginner
title: Lightwave 11.5 Modeler Volume 1
